title: iruppiDam kaNDu
sahitya:
iruppiDam kaNDu koNDEn jayanuL


anupallavi

  maruvi en manakkOyilil magizhvuDan tangi manam kanindu en paNNilum uraiyum unn-


caraNam    kOTAnukOTit-tavam sheidu bhuviyil gOvindA undan kOlam kaNDughandu
 AdippADi unran ambuja pada malaril aDimaik-kihaparattil araikkaNam piriyAd-
